Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: 64-bit MS Windows

name: Safe-Our-Souls Workstation

screenshots.caption: Main screen of SOS-Workstation is simple. You have 20 shortcuts for fast operations. SOS-Workstation works on background and start automatically depending on your scripts configuration.
Declaring a new automatic script is easy. Complete the different screens. Once recorded, forget it. Your script will start automatically.
You can focus on a date, a windows or network event, a usb insertion, a program or file used to start a script. Many powerful options are available.
You have many tools to see how your scripts are executed. Many statistics tools provided.
A backup is running. SOS-Workstation can start unlimited scripts at the same time, depending on the trigger. All backups can run simultenaously. The backup can be hidden and run in stealth mode.

short_description: SOS-Workstation is a backup software that allows Windows or User events to start programmable Scripts. Easy to use and configure. Provided with tools and help to program your own scripts. Unlimited running scripts at the same time. Encryption of your data. Can simply start a script by inserting a USB key... Date, network, Files, Program, Peripherals or Windows events. Available in 32 & 64 bits for Windows. Embedded Big-Data functions. Can send mails or messages on completion or uncomplete scrit execution. Can be stealth and duplicate data in hidden-mode without disturbing users.
summary: Backup software, Encryption, FTP, Programmable scripts, Events
